MCQ: Who coined the term machine learning?
Choices: a: Donald Hebb | b: Arthur Samuel | c: Walter Pitts | d: Warren McCulloch

MCQ: What was the purpose of the early machine learning model developed by Arthur Samuel?
Choices: a: To analyze sonar signals | b: To calculate winning chances in checkers | c: To recognize patterns in speech | d: To classify cancerous moles

MCQ: Who proposed the early mathematical models of neural networks?
Choices: a: Donald Hebb | b: Arthur Samuel | c: Walter Pitts | d: Warren McCulloch

MCQ: What did the experimental learning machine called Cybertron analyze?
Choices: a: Speech patterns | b: Electrocardiograms | c: Sonar signals | d: All of the above

MCQ: What is one of the objectives of modern-day machine learning?
Choices: a: To classify data based on developed models | b: To recognize patterns in speech | c: To analyze sonar signals | d: To train neural networks
